ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 32 dataflow units x 500 INT8 ops/unit/clock = 16,000 INT8 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int4: 32 dataflow units x 1000 INT4 ops/unit/clock = 32,000 INT4 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: Dataflow architecture with all-on-chip processing. No external DRAM. Network-specific compilation.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (1600 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: 26 TOPS INT8 @ 2.5W = 10.4 TOPS/W. Dataflow architecture with all-on-chip processing. 16nm TSMC. No external DRAM (uses on-chip SRAM). Best-in-class power efficiency for edge AI. For cameras, drones, industrial inspection.
